abstract: Central Park's Lasker ice skating rink may re-open ahead of schedule, potentially salvaging most of winter season, thanks to repairs being completed faster than expected; two-year-old Van Cortland Park Ice Skating Rink in Bronx, which has been operating at loss, will not open for season.
lead_paragraph: The parks department said it might soon start making ice again at Lasker Rink, while in the Bronx, a rink in Van Cortlandt Park may be doomed.

keywords.value: Van Cortlandt Park Ice Skating Rink
keywords.name: organizations

headline.main: Lasker Rink in Central Park Might Open Earlier Than Expected
headline.print_headline: Speedy Repairs May Salvage Season for an Ice Rink

snippet: The parks department said it might soon start making ice again at Lasker Rink, while in the Bronx, a rink in Van Cortlandt Park may be doomed....
